params.identifier: The hash of an identifier of the receiver of the escrowed payment.

getReceivedPaymentIds(bytes32).return: An array containing all the IDs of the Escrowed Payments that were received by the specified receiver.

params.sender: The address of the sender of the escrowed payments.

getSentPaymentIds(address).return: An array containing all the IDs of the Escrowed Payments that were sent by the specified sender.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

revoke(address).details: Throws if 'token' or 'value' is 0.Throws if msg.sender is not the sender of payment.Throws if redeem time hasn't been reached yet.

params.paymentId: The ID for the EscrowedPayment struct that contains all relevant information.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transfer(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256.details: Throws if 'token' or 'value' is 0.msg.sender needs to have already approved this contract to transferIf no identifier is given, then minAttestations must be 0.

params.expirySeconds: The number of seconds before the sender can revoke the payment.
params.identifier: The hashed identifier of a user to transfer to.
params.minAttestations: The min number of attestations required to withdraw the payment.
params.paymentId: The address of the temporary wallet associated with this payment. Users must       prove ownership of the corresponding private key to withdraw from escrow.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdraw(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32).details: Throws if 'token' or 'value' is 0.Throws if msg.sender does not prove ownership of the withdraw key.

params.paymentId: The ID for the EscrowedPayment struct that contains all relevant information.
params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

getReceivedPaymentIds(bytes32).notice: Gets array of all Escrowed Payments received by identifier.

getSentPaymentIds(address).notice: Gets array of all Escrowed Payment IDs sent by sender.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revoke(address).notice: Revokes tokens for a sender who is redeeming a payment after it has expired.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

transfer(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Transfer tokens to a specific user. Supports both identity with privacy (an empty        identifier and 0 minAttestations) and without (with identifier and minAttestations).

withdraw(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Withdraws tokens for a verified user.
